PL_YMS_Platform::gpsBased = Is this system based on GPS?
PL_YMS_Platform::visualizationSupport = Does this warehouse provide a visualization?
PL_YMS_Platform::useJms = Shall Java Messaging Service be used for communication?
PL_YMS_Platform::jmsConnection = In case of useJms: What is the URL to connect to?
PL_YMS_Platform::queueName = In case of useJms: What is the JMS queue name?
PL_YMS_Platform::jockeyComponent = Configures the Jockey subsystem
PL_YMS_Platform::mobilityComponent = Configures the mobility subsystem
PL_YMS_Platform::ddsComponent = Configures the DDS subsystem
